mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.logo AS "logo", a.rtmp_hd AS "rtmpHd", a.rtmp_sd AS "rtmpSd", a.rtmp_nd AS "rtmpNd", a.rtmp_vn AS "rtmpVn", a.hls_hd AS "hlsHd", a.hls_sd AS "hlsSd", a.hls_nd AS "hlsNd", a.hls_vn AS "hlsVn", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_live_channel( id, name, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, logo, rtmp_hd, rtmp_sd, rtmp_nd, rtmp_vn, hls_hd, hls_sd, hls_nd, hls_vn, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{logo}, #{rtmpHd}, #{rtmpSd}, #{rtmpNd}, #{rtmpVn}, #{hlsHd}, #{hlsSd}, #{hlsNd}, #{hlsVn}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting_live_channel SET name = #{name}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, logo = #{logo}, rtmp_hd = #{rtmpHd}, rtmp_sd = #{rtmpSd}, rtmp_nd = #{rtmpNd}, rtmp_vn = #{rtmpVn}, hls_hd = #{hlsHd}, hls_sd = #{hlsSd}, hls_nd = #{hlsNd}, hls_vn = #{hlsVn}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
